head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WILKES, ROBERT SETH, M.D.

identified-content.classifier: Liberty State Park Music and Heritage Festival
Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WILKES, ROBERT SETH, M.D.

abstract.p: Liberty State Park Music and Heritage Festival in Jersey City, NJ, set to open as part of OpSail 2000, will include performance by Andrea Boccelli and New Jersey Symphony Orchestra; photo (M)

block.p: WILKES-Robert Seth, M.D. In Novato, Ca., on June 20, 2000, age 65. Beloved husband of Barbara J. Wilkes. Loving father of Debra (Jason) McKinley, Jackie (Warren) Burks and Kenneth Wilkes. Devoted grandfather of five. Dear brother of, Leonard Wilkes and the late Conrad Wilkes. Loving uncle and great uncle. Dr. Wilkes practiced internal medicine for 35 years in Novato, Ca. Funeral was held June 23rd in San Rafael, Ca.

Devoted grandfather of five. Dear brother of, Leonard Wilkes and the late Conrad Wilkes. Loving uncle and great uncle. Dr. Wilkes practiced internal medicine for 35 years in Novato, Ca. Funeral was held June 23rd in San Rafael, Ca.
